SEARCH
Package gw.pl.external.configuration

Interface ExternalConfigurationProvider

All Known Subinterfaces:
ExternalConfigurationProviderPlugin
public interface ExternalConfigurationProvider
Provider of the values to be used for property substitution.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final ExternalConfigurationProvider
    NO_OP_PROVIDER

  • Field Details

    • NO_OP_PROVIDER

      static final ExternalConfigurationProvider NO_OP_PROVIDER

  • Method Details

    • lookupValue

      String lookupValue(String namespace, String key)
      Deprecated.
      use lookupValue(String, String, long) instead
      This method returns the property value of the key formed by namespace + "." + key. Note that this method always returns the initial version of the property. Property updates are not reflected by this method. Initial version is the version loaded during plugin initialization.
      Parameters:
      namespace - namespace of the subsystem
      key - property key name
      Returns:
      value of the key.

    • lookupValue

      default String lookupValue(String namespace, String key, long version)
      Returns the specified version of the property value of the key formed by namespace + "." + key
      Parameters:
      namespace - namespace of the subsystem
      key - property key name
      version - version of the property whose value is being asked for.
      Returns:
      value of the key.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if version is invalid or does not exist

    • getLatestVersion

      default long getLatestVersion()
      Returns the global latest version of the properties. Note that lookupValue(namespace, key, getLatestVersion()) must always work. If the implementation does not support versioning it returns the same result as lookupValue(namespace, key)
      Returns:
      version

    • subscribe

      default void subscribe(long version, String namespace, ConfigPropertyChangeListener listener)
      Subscribes a listener
      Parameters:
      version - version at the time when listener sends a request to subscribe
      namespace - namespace of the subsystem
      listener - listener to be registered

    • unsubscribe

      default void unsubscribe(ConfigPropertyChangeListener listener)
      Unsubscribes a listener
      Parameters:
      listener - listener to be unsubsribed
